abstract: Citigroup is closing in on a chief executive and the board appears to be leaning toward an insider, The New York Times reported Saturday, citing people briefed on the situation. The inside candidate, Vikram S. Pandit, is a former Morgan Stanley investment banker who joined Citigroup seven months ago, these people said.
